alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 08 at 2:06PM CDT until October 09 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. * WHERE...North St. Louis, Northern Cook and Lake, Central St. Louis, Southern Lake and Southern Cook Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation and the Bois Forte Band, Nett Lake and, Lake Vermilion areas. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The coldest temperatures will be inland from Lake Superior.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
